import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiBell, FiSearch, FiMenu, FiHome, FiUser } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = ({ onMenuClick, user, onLogout }) => { const [showNotifications, setShowNotifications] = useState(false); const [showUserMenu, setShowUserMenu] = useState(false); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { navigate(`/tasks?search=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery)}`); } }; const handleLogout = () => { setShowUserMenu(false); onLogout(); }; return (
{/* Left side - Logo and Menu */}
{/* Logo */}
TM
Task Manager {/* Navigation Links - Desktop */}
الرئيسية المهام
{/* Center - Search */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="ابحث في المهام..." className="w-full pr-10 pl-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-shadow" />
{/* Right side - User and Notifications */}
{/* Notifications */}
{showNotifications && (

الإشعارات

تم إنشاء مهمة جديدة

منذ دقيقتين

مهمة قريبة من الموعد النهائي

منذ ساعة

مهمة مكتملة بنجاح

منذ يوم
)}
{/* User Profile */}
{showUserMenu && (
{/* User Info */}

{user?.name || 'المستخدم'}

{user?.email || 'user@example.com'}

{/* Menu Items */}
setShowUserMenu(false)} className="flex items-center gap-2 w-full text-right px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100" > الرئيسية setShowUserMenu(false)} className="flex items-center gap-2 w-full text-right px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100" > الملف الشخصي
{/* Logout */}
)}
{/* Mobile Search (visible only on small screens) */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder="ابحث في المهام..." className="w-full pr-10 pl-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent outline-none" />
); }; export default Header;
